content:
on Friday Nov. world famous cellist YoYo Ma and famous pianist Kathryn Stott will be performing their music together at Eisenhower Auditorium PERIOD

The pair of musicians have performed together for over three decades in an effort to bring their music to the world PERIOD

Additionally on an individual level each has gained wide success with their musical compositions PERIOD

YoYo Ma has produced over  albums in his career as a cellist  of which have won him Grammy Awards PERIOD

Stott as well has gathered success in her career with winning a prize at the Leeds International Piano Competition and more recently in being appointed the position of artistic director for the Australian Festival of Chamber Music PERIOD

Together the pair of musicians has gathered a large amount of success PERIOD The pair additionally has produced several albums together two of which have won Grammy Awards PERIOD

Penn State professors are very excited for these world renowned musicians to be making their way to Penn State PERIOD

Kim Cook a distinguished professor of music in cello is excited to have YoYo Ma at Penn State PERIOD

YoYo Ma has been inspirational to many musicians and has helped to draw attention to classical music Cook said PERIOD We are excited to have him here at Penn State. cook prior to the concert has even organized the Penn State Cello festival from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD with  of her colleagues and afterward they will be attending the YoYo Ma and Kathryn Stott performance together PERIOD

Tickets to the concert can be purchased through the Center for the Performing Arts at Penn State PERIOD Ticket prices range from  to  for adults however student ticket prices are discounted to prices ranging from  to  PERIOD The performance begins at  p.m PERIOD on Friday Nov PERIOD  at Eisenhower Auditorium PERIOD
